summary: Prepared initial drag-and-drop UX strategy for TaskDetailPaneA fields
Identified key interaction points for text and thumbnail dragging
Outlined drop handling and success animation requirements

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Drag-and-Drop Interaction for Text Fields
suggestedTasks.description: Create draggable text selection mechanism in TaskDetailPaneA. Enable text extraction with visual drag handles. Implement cross-component drag events that support copying description/note content to SessionCard inputs. Ensure consistent UX across different text field types.
suggestedTasks.reason: Initial drag-and-drop UX strategy requires detailed implementation

suggestedTasks.title: Add Drag and Drop Unit and Integration Tests
suggestedTasks.description: Develop comprehensive test suite for drag-and-drop functionality. Create unit tests for drag event handling, drop validation, and success animations. Implement integration tests to verify interaction between TaskDetailPaneA and SessionCard components.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure robust implementation of new interaction pattern

patterns: Implement visual feedback for drag interactions

documentationNeeds: Document new drag-and-drop feature in component README
